@graph.description: UCI India is a dynamic, women-led organization with over 24 years of expertise in providing cutting-edge IT solutions. As an award-winning, minority-owned business, we focus on Salesforce, Oracle, Microsoft, and other technologies.

@graph.name: UCI-INDIA IT Solutions and Services
@graph.description: UCI India provides cutting-edge IT solutions, specializing in Salesforce, Oracle, and Microsoft technologies. We are a leading Salesforce Partner in the Public Sector, offering innovative IT solutions and services.
